content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    pattern = r"\```julia\n((\n.*?\n)*?)\n\```"s
    match = match(pattern, md))
    
    if isnothing(match) # If no Julia code blocks are found
        return ""
    else
        return join(match[2].split("\n")), "\n") # Extract the matched code and remove code fences
    end
end
```
This function uses a regular expression to match all Julia code blocks in the provided markdown document `md`. It then extracts the matched code, removes the code fences (`\```) and joins the code blocks together with a newline. If no Julia code blocks are found, it returns an empty string.
